data.eml:eml: The oldest platylepadid turtle barnacle (Cirripedia, Coronuloidea): a new species of Platylepas from the Lower Pleistocene of Italy

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Collareta, Alberto, Reitano, Agatino, Rosso, Antonietta, Sanfilippo, Rossana, Bosselaers, Mark, Bianucci, Giovanni, Insacco, Gianni (2019): The oldest platylepadid turtle barnacle (Cirripedia, Coronuloidea): a new species of Platylepas from the Lower Pleistocene of Italy. European Journal of Taxonomy 516: 1-17, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.516
